mapper.select: select line_media, line_pageview, line_weekday from chart_line where line_media = '微博'
select line_media, line_pageview, line_weekday from chart_line where line_media = '微信'
select line_media, line_pageview, line_weekday from chart_line where line_media = '贴吧'
select line_media, line_pageview, line_weekday from chart_line where line_media = '抖音'
select line_media, line_pageview, line_weekday from chart_line where line_media = '快手'
